mapper.select: select * from movie order by mid limit #{start},#{length}
select * from movie where name like #{key} order by mid limit #{start},#{length}
select A.mid,A.genre,ROUND(A.score,2)as score, movie.name from (select * from genrestopmovies where genre=#{genre} order by score desc limit 5) A join movie on A.mid = movie.mid
SELECT A.mid, A.count, movie.name from (SELECT * FROM ratemoremovies order by count desc limit 10)A join movie where A.mid = movie.mid limit #{start},#{length};;

SELECT A.mid, A.count, movie.name from (select * from rateMoreRecentlyMovies where yearmonth=(select max(yearmonth) from rateMoreRecentlyMovies) order by count desc limit 10)A join movie where A.mid = movie.mid limit #{start},#{length};
SELECT A.mid, A.avg as rate, movie.name from (SELECT * FROM `averagemovies` ORDER BY avg DESC limit 10)A join movie on A.mid = movie.mid limit #{start},#{length};
